00049 /**
00050  * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00051  * they describe themselves.
00052  */
00053 ChipStreamFactory::ChipStreamFactory() {
00054   // 
00055   m_WriteSketchGroup_a5=NULL;
00056 
00057   // RmaBgTran
00058   m_Docs.push_back(RmaBgTran::explainSelf());
00059   m_Creators.push_back(&RmaBgTran::newObject);
00060 
00061   // Quantile Normalization
00062   m_Docs.push_back(SketchQuantNormTran::explainSelf());
00063   m_Creators.push_back(&SketchQuantNormTran::newObject);
00064 
00065   // Generic Transformation
00066   m_Docs.push_back(ArtifactReduction::explainSelf());
00067   m_Creators.push_back(&ArtifactReduction::newObject);
00068 
00069   // Median Normalization
00070   m_Docs.push_back(MedNormTran::explainSelf());
00071   m_Creators.push_back(&MedNormTran::newObject);
00072 
00073   // AdapterType Normalization
00074   m_Docs.push_back(AdapterTypeNormTran::explainSelf());
00075   m_Creators.push_back(&AdapterTypeNormTran::newObject);
00076 
00077   // GcBg
00078   m_Docs.push_back(GcBg::explainSelf());
00079   m_Creators.push_back(&GcBg::newObject);
00080 
00081   // IntensityReporter
00082   m_Docs.push_back(IntensityReporter::explainSelf());
00083   m_Creators.push_back(&IntensityReporter::newObject);
00084 
00085   // ChipStream -- placeholder chipstream that does no tranformations
00086   m_Docs.push_back(ChipStream::explainSelf());
00087   m_Creators.push_back(&ChipStream::newObject);
00088 
00089   m_uiCelFileCount = 0;
00090   m_WriteProfileGroup_a5 = NULL;
00091 }
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * @brief Create a pointer to a new ChipStream object as described
00095  * in the string specification.
00096  * @param spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000
00097  *
00098  * @return Pointer to new ChipStream objects, must be deleted when
00099  * finished.
00100  */
00101 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::cStreamForString(const std::string &spec) {
00102   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00103   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00104   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(spec, m_Docs, m_Creators, "ChipStream");
00105   /* Check class type. */
00106   if(InstanceOf(create, ChipStream)) {
00107     stream = static_cast<ChipStream *>(create);
00108   }
00109   else {
00110     Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type ChipStream.");
00111   }
00112   return stream;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /**
00116  * @brief Factory for making ChipStreams from a string description.
00117  *
00118  * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00119  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00120  * @param description - name of chipstream path so far.
00121  * @return ChipStream requested.
00122  */
00123 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForString(const std::string &spec, 
00124                                                    ChipLayout &layout,
00125                                                    const std::string &description) {
00126   ChipStreamFactory factory;
00127   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00128 
00129   stream = cStreamForString(spec);
00130   assert(stream);
00131   int pmSize = layout.getPmProbeMask().size();
00132 //   if(pmSize == 0)
00133 //     Err::errAbort("ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForString() - Must have some perfect match probes on chip.");
00134   vector<bool> pmProbes(pmSize);
00135   vector<vector<float> > probes;
00136   Verbose::out(2, ToStr("Made ChipStream of type: ") + ToStr(stream->getType()));
00137   /* Some ChipStream specific operations. */
00138   if(InstanceOf(stream, RmaBgTran)) {
00139     static_cast<RmaBgTran *>(stream)->setPmProbes(layout.getPmProbeMask());
00140   }
00141   if(InstanceOf(stream, MedNormTran)) {
00142     MedNormTran *s = static_cast<MedNormTran *>(stream);
00143     if(!m_NormProbes.empty()) {
00144       vector<bool> subset(layout.getProbeCount(), false);
00145       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_NormProbes.size(); i++)
00146         subset[m_NormProbes[i]] = true;
00147       s->setSubProbes(subset);
00148     }
00149   }
00150   if (InstanceOf(stream, AdapterTypeNormTran)) 
00151   {
00152     AdapterTypeNormTran *s = static_cast<AdapterTypeNormTran *>(stream);
00153         s->setup(m_strAnnotationFileName, &layout, m_uiCelFileCount);
00154   }
00155   if(InstanceOf(stream, SketchQuantNormTran)) {
00156     SketchQuantNormTran *s = static_cast<SketchQuantNormTran *>(stream);
00157     s->setProbeCount(layout.getProbeCount());
00158     /* Do we have a specific sketch we are normalizing to? */
00159     if(m_TargetSketch.size() > 0) {
00160       s->setTargetSketch(m_TargetSketch);
00161     }
00162     /* Set pm probes if using them for normalization. */
00163     if(s->getUsePmSubset()) {
00164       s->setSubProbes(layout.getPmProbeMask());
00165     }
00166     /* Else if we have another specific subset use that. */
00167     else {
00168       if(!m_NormProbes.empty()) {
00169         vector<bool> subset(layout.getProbeCount(), false);
00170         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_NormProbes.size(); i++)
00171           subset[m_NormProbes[i]] = true;
00172         s->setSubProbes(subset);
00173       }
00174     }
00175     if(!m_WriteSketchDir.empty()) {
00176       string outFile = Fs::join(m_WriteSketchDir,description + s->getType() +".normalization-target.txt");
00177       s->saveTargetSketch(outFile);
00178     }
00179     if(!m_WriteSketchDir_a5.empty()) {
00180       string outFile = Fs::join(m_WriteSketchDir_a5,description + s->getType()+".normalization-target.a5");
00181       s->saveTargetSketch_a5(outFile);
00182     }
00183     if (m_WriteSketchGroup_a5!=NULL) {
00184       s->saveTargetSketch_group_a5(m_WriteSketchGroup_a5);
00185     }
00186 
00187   }
00188 // Generic data: boy this is too complex 
00189     if(InstanceOf(stream, ArtifactReduction)) {
00190     ArtifactReduction *s = static_cast<ArtifactReduction *>(stream);
00191     
00192     // only sets up file names for i/o
00193     // 
00194     // reading from somewhere, pass filename down into the ArtifactReduction object
00195     if (!m_ReadProfile.empty()){
00196             s->setreadReferenceProfile(m_ReadProfile);
00197         }
00198    
00199     if(!m_WriteProfileDir.empty()) {
00200       string outFile = m_WriteProfileDir + description + s->getType() + ToStr(".generic-target.txt");
00201       s->saveReferenceProfile(outFile);
00202     }
00203 
00204     // make the object aware of structure
00205     s->AddLayout(&layout);
00206 
00207     // pass layout to object if needed
00208         // look to other methods
00209 
00210 
00211     
00212     /*if(!m_WriteProfileDir_a5.empty()) {
00213       string outFile = m_WriteProfileDir_a5 + description + s->getType() + ToStr(".generic-target.a5");
00214       s->saveReferenceProfile_a5(outFile);
00215     }
00216     if (m_WriteProfileGroup_a5!=NULL) {
00217       s->saveReferenceProfile_group_a5(m_WriteReferenceProfileGroup_a5);
00218       }*/
00219 
00220   }
00221 // end generic data
00222     
00223   if(InstanceOf(stream, GcBg)) {
00224     if(m_GcControlProbes.empty()) {
00225       Err::errAbort("chipStreamForString() - Must set control probes to make GcBg Chipstream object.");
00226     }
00227     GcBg *gcbg = static_cast<GcBg *>(stream);
00228     gcbg->setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00229     gcbg->setProbeGcVec(layout.getGcProbeVec());
00230   }
00231   return stream;
00232 }

00234 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForStringBoard(PsBoard &board,
00235                                                         const std::string &spec, 
00236                                                         const std::string &description) {
00237   ChipStreamFactory factory;
00238   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00239 
00240   stream = cStreamForString(spec);
00241   assert(stream);
00242   //int pmSize = board.getProbeInfo()->getProbeCount();
00243   Verbose::out(2, ToStr("Made ChipStream of type: ") + ToStr(stream->getType()));
00244   stream->setParameters(board);
00245   return stream;
00246 }

00248 void ChipStreamFactory::readNormProbesFromFile(const std::string& fileName) {
00249   TsvFile tsv;
00250   vector<int> probeIds;
00251   int id;
00252 
00253   if(tsv.open(fileName) != TSV_OK) {
00254     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open '" + fileName + "' to read.");
00255   }
00256   tsv.bind(0, "probe_id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00257   while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00258     probeIds.push_back(TO_ZEROBASED(id));
00259   }
00260   setProbesForNorm(probeIds);
00261   tsv.close();
00262 }

00264 /**
00265  * Open and read a target distribution from a text file. Must have a column
00266  * called 'intensities' with distribution quantiles sorted from highest to
00267  * lowest.
00268  *
00269  * @param fileName - text file containing column of quantiles.
00270  */
00271 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile(const std::string& fileName) {
00272   SketchQuantNormTran::readTargetSketchFromFile(fileName, m_TargetSketch);
00273 }
00274 
00275 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile_a5(const std::string& fileName) {
00276   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00277   file5->open(fileName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00278   
00279   readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(file5,"target-sketch");
00280   
00281   file5->close();
00282   delete file5;
00283 }
00284   
00285 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(affx::File5_Group* group5,
00286                                                         const std::string& name)
00287 {
00288   //printf("### reading A5 sketch from: '%s'\n",name.c_str());
00289   double intensity;
00290   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=group5->openTsv("target-sketch",affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00291 
00292   m_TargetSketch.clear();
00293   while (tsv5->nextLine()==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00294     tsv5->get(0,0,&intensity);
00295     m_TargetSketch.push_back(intensity);
00296   }
00297   //
00298   tsv5->close();
00299   delete tsv5;
00300 }

00302 bool ChipStreamFactory::canBuild(const std::string &spec) {
00303   return SelfCreate::canMake(spec, m_Docs);
00304 }
